title: Theatre for a New Audience’s 24/25 Season
description: Theatre for a New Audience is proud to celebrate its 45th season with American and World Premieres of three plays by Ethan Lipton, Wole Soyinka, and Taylor Mac, as well as a work by William Shakespeare. We present Shakespeare alongside some of the theatre’s most distinctive contemporary authors in order to give you the opportunity to experience the Bard interpreted with the same immediacy as plays written today. If you subscribe to our 24-25 season by August 22, you can take advantage of exclusive early-bird pricing. You’ll receive tickets for all four shows at just $52 each (regularly $90), a savings of 42% off the full ticket price, while enjoying exclusive benefits like priority booking, flexible ticket exchanges, discounted guest tickets, and more.
address: Polonsky Shakespeare Center, 262 Ashland Place, Brooklyn, NY 11217
